statements: SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM Customer;
SELECT name, email FROM Customer WHERE id > 10;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT id, name FROM Customer ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Customer WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE name LIKE '%John%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM Customer WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) OR phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, email FROM Customer WHERE name = 'Alice' AND phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customer_information;
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries WHERE itinerary_id = 1;
SELECT destination, departure_date, return_date FROM travel_itineraries WHERE itinerary_id = 2;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT itinerary_id, destination, departure_date FROM travel_itineraries WHERE return_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY destination DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_information JOIN travel_itineraries ON customer_information.customer_id = travel_itineraries.itinerary_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, total_price FROM bookings ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(b.booking_id) as total_bookings FROM customers c INNER JOIN itineraries i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id INNER JOIN bookings b ON i.itinerary_id = b.itinerary_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT i.itinerary_name, b.total_price FROM itineraries i INNER JOIN bookings b ON i.itinerary_id = b.itinerary_id WHERE b.total_price > 1000;

SELECT c.customer_name, i.itinerary_name, b.total_price FROM customers c INNER JOIN itineraries i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id INNER JOIN bookings b ON i.itinerary_id = b.itinerary_id WHERE c.customer_id = 2 ORDER BY b.total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT itinerary_id, destination, start_date, end_date FROM travel_itineraries WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT booking_id, total_cost FROM bookings WHERE total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT itinerary_id, destination, start_date, end_date FROM travel_itineraries ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, total_cost FROM bookings WHERE total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY booking_date ASC;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date, amount_due, payment_status FROM invoices WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TravelItinerary WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT booking_id, total_amount FROM BookingDetails ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT destination, start_date, end_date FROM TravelItinerary WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name FROM Customer WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT destination, start_date, end_date FROM TravelItinerary WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY destination ASC;
SELECT r.rating, r.comment, b.total_amount FROM Review r INNER JOIN BookingDetails b ON r.booking_id = b.booking_id WHERE r.rating >= 4 ORDER BY b.total_amount DESC;
